def_cn: (用以锁住非法停靠车辆的)车轮固定夹，轮夹
def_en: A wheel clamp is a large metal device which is fitted to the wheel of an illegally parked car or other vehicle in order to prevent it from being driven away. The motorist has to pay to have the clamp removed.
If a car is wheel clamped, a wheel clamp is fixed to one of its wheels so that it cannot be driven away.
